wiki.content: "Lost" is the second single from Michael Bublé's third studio album, Call Me Irresponsible. The song was inspired by the breakup with his former fiancée Debbie Timuss. The song peaked at #97 on US Billboard Hot 100 in 2007. Bublé performed the song on The X Factor on December 8, 2007. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
